A

absoluteFrequence(char) - Method in class LinguisticModel
This method returns the absolute frequency of the character c if c it's a lowercase alphabetic letter('a'..'

D

detect(String) - Method in class Trainer
This method builds a linguistic model for the past text as an argument, and it compares it to all models of all languages that at this moment the trainer knows.
difference(LinguisticModel) - Method in class LinguisticModel
This method calculates the difference in norm L2 between this linguistic model and the linguistic model m

H

Histogram - Class in <Unnamed>
This class allows you to view the model as a series of histograms
Histogram(int) - Constructor for class Histogram
This constructor creates a histogram where each line has the indicated width.

L

LinguisticModel - Class in <Unnamed>
This class provides a linguistic model that tracks how many times each letter of the alphabet appeared in the analyzed texts (absolute frequency) and how many letters in all they are views.
LinguisticModel() - Constructor for class LinguisticModel
This method creates an untrained linguistic model on any text.
LinguisticModel(String) - Constructor for class LinguisticModel
This method creates a linguistic model trained on the given text.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Trainer
 

N

nLetters() - Method in class LinguisticModel
 
nTexts() - Method in class LinguisticModel
 

P

print(int) - Method in class Trainer
This method prints all the Histogram of all languages the trainer knows, each preceded by the name of the language.

R

readFile(String) - Static method in class Trainer
This method reads the text file specified by the argument and stores it into a String
relativeFrequence(char) - Method in class LinguisticModel
if at least one character has been seen, this method returns the relative frequency of the character (its absolute frequency divided by the total number of characters); otherwise, returns 1.0 / 26.

T

toString(LinguisticModel) - Method in class Histogram
This method creates a String that represents the linguistic model m.
toString() - Method in class LinguisticModel
 
toString() - Method in class Trainer
 
train(String) - Method in class LinguisticModel
This method trains the linguistic model on the given text.
train(String, String) - Method in class Trainer
If the language 'nameLang' is unknown, this method creates a new linguistic model for that language by training it with the supplied text; if the language is already known, the text is used to further train the corresponding model.
Trainer - Class in <Unnamed>
This class maintains a list of linguistic models of various languages, and a parallel list of language names.
Trainer() - Constructor for class Trainer
This constructor creates an empty trainer
